## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description       | Type                           | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Is it disabled    | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`     | List select name  | `string`                       | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | List select value | `number \| string \| string[]` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event             | Description           | Type               |
| ----------------- | --------------------- | ------------------ |
| `selectedChanged` | Emits on value change | `CustomEvent<any>` |
